title: Draft pick keeps disappearing at random intervals
body: Title says it all. One hour it's available, and the other it's not. Nothing about this in any kind of status update either. What's happening? Anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: ( Taken from Riot's Post) you'll see "DRAFT PICK" available in your client from Midday until Midnight (12:00 to 23:59). These are the peak times that we feel the queue can operate well in. We will TURN THE QUEUE OFF at night, from 00:00 to 11:59. This means you won't see the queue in your client until the next day. That is only for Eune because of high Queue waiting times. I hope i helped clear things out  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Hey guys, I'm not seeing any issues with queues being disabled.  Is this still an issue?
It happened to me also,i dunno whats the problem
